get.summary: Retrieves all collections registered in the database.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter term for search.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page index (zero-based) for pagination.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size for pagination.

post.summary: Synchronizes object collections with an Apache Solr backend.

parameters.name: solr
parameters.description: Name of the Apache Solr configuration to use.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the collection to synchronize with.

get.summary: Gets information about an existing collection.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the collection that should be fetched.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the collection that should be updated.

post.summary: Posts a new image for the provided collection.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the collection the image should be added to.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the collection that should be deleted.

get.summary: Gets the preview image for the provided collection.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the collection the image should be retrieved for.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the image.

delete.summary: Deletes the preview image for the provided collection.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the collection the image should be deleted for.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the image to delete.

get.summary: Retrieves all institutions registered in the database.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page index (zero-based) for pagination.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size for pagination.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The attribute to order by. Possible values are 'name', 'city', 'zip', 'canton' and 'publish'.

parameters.name: orderDir
parameters.description: The sort order. Possible values are 'asc' and 'desc'.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A user-defined filter to search for institutions.

get.summary: Retrieves all institution names registered in the database.

post.summary: Synchronizes institutions with an Apache Solr backend.

parameters.name: solr
parameters.description: Name of the Apache Solr configuration to use.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the collection to synchronize with.

get.summary: Gets information about an existing institution.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the institution that should be fetched.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the institution that should be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the institution that should be deleted.

get.summary: Gets the preview image for the provided institution.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the institution the image should be retrieved for.

post.summary: Posts a new image for the provided institution.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the institution the image should be added to.

get.summary: Retrieves all jobs that are currently active. Non-administrator users can only see Jobs that belong to them.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page index (zero-based) for pagination.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size for pagination.

get.summary: Retrieves all jobs that are currently inactive (job history). Non-administrator users can only see Jobs that belong to them.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page index (zero-based) for pagination.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size for pagination.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Job that should be aborted.

get.summary: Retrieves the job log for the provided job ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Job for which the logs should be retrieved.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page index (zero-based) for pagination.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size  for pagination.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: A filter for the 'level' field.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: A filter for the 'context' field.

delete.summary: Purges the logs for the job with the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Job for which the logs should be pruged.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Job that should be started.

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: True, if only a test-run should be executed.

put.summary: Uploads a file for the given job.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Job for which a file should be uploaded.

parameters.name: first
parameters.description: Set to 'true' if the submitted chunk is the first one.

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: Set to 'true' if the submitted chunk is the last one.

get.summary: Lists all available entity mappings.
Lists all available entity mapping formats.
Lists all available parses available for entity mapping.
Retrieves all the details about an entity mapping.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the entity mapping that should be retrieved.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the entity mapping that should be deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the entity mapping that should be updated.

get.summary: Lists all available cantons.
Lists all available right statements.
Lists all available participants.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the participant to delete.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the new participant. Must be unique!

post.summary: Attempts a login using the credentials provided in the request body.

get.summary: Performs a logout for the currently logged-in user.
Checks and returns the status of the current session.
Returns information about the currently logged-in user.
Lists all available Apache Solr configurations.

post.summary: Creates a new Apache Solr configuration.

get.summary: Lists all available formats available for image deployment.
Retrieves all the details about an Apache Solr configuration.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Apache Solr configuration that should be deleted.

delete.summary: Deletes an existing Apache Solr configuration.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Apache Solr configuration that should be deleted.

put.summary: Updates an existing Apache Solr configuration.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Apache Solr configuration that should be updated.

get.summary: Lists all available job templates.
Lists all available job template types.
Deletes an existing job template.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the job template to retrieve.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the job template that should be deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the job template that should be updated.

get.summary: Lists all available transformer types.
Retrieves all users registered in the database.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page index (zero-based) for pagination.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size for pagination.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The attribute to order by. Possible values are 'name', 'email', 'inactive'.

parameters.name: orderDir
parameters.description: The sort order. Possible values are 'asc' and 'desc'.

get.summary: Lists all available roles.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user that should be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user that should be deleted.

get.summary: An endpoint that provides OAI-PMH harvesting for the specified collection.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The collection to harvest.

parameters.name: verb
parameters.description: The OAI-PMH verb.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The identifier to harvest (used for GetRecord ).

parameters.name: resumptionToken
parameters.description: The OAI-PMH resumption token (used for ListIdentifiers and ListRecords).

parameters.name: metadataPrefix
parameters.description: The OAI-PMH metadata prefix (used for GetRecord, ListIdentifiers and ListRecords).

parameters.name: set
parameters.description: The OAI-PMH set criterion for selective harvesting (used for ListIdentifiers and ListRecords).

post.summary: An endpoint that provides OAI-PMH harvesting for the specified collection.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The collection to harvest.

requestBody.description: Multipart form data containing the form fields to upload.
